kobold.name: a kobold
kobold.description: Mangy, matted fur covers the kobold's body. It stands just over two feet and resembles a small dog on its hind legs.
kobold.entrance_text: A nearby bush rustles for a brief moment before a small creature jumps out. A kobold seems to have wandered into the area.
kobold.move_out_text: A kobold slowly wanders out of the area.
kobold.move_in_text: A kobold slowly wanders into the area.
kobold.death_text: A kobold staggers and eventually slumps to the ground, motionless.

goblin.name: a goblin
goblin.move_out_text: A goblin slowly wanders out of the area.
goblin.move_in_text: A goblin slowly wanders into the area.
goblin.death_text: A goblin staggers and eventually slumps to the ground, motionless.

wild_boar.name: a wild boar
wild_boar.move_out_text: A wild boar rushes out of the area.
wild_boar.move_in_text: A wild boar rushes into the area.
wild_boar.death_text: A wild boar staggers and eventually slumps to the ground, motionless.
